Headline: No O'hare-bound Blue Line Trains Between Damen and Harlem
ShortDescription: O'hare-bound Blue Line service has been suspended between Damen and Harlem due to a stalled train at California.  Crews are working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line service has been suspended between Damen and Harlem due to a stalled train at California. 

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

  • Normal Service O'Hare to Forest Park and,
  • O'Hare-bound service between Forest Park and Damen, only.

 Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service between Damen and Harlem-OH.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
